dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria unius hora".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features an illustration of a compass rose.
3 inset maps: Syriae veteris descriptio -- Castra Israelitarum in deserto -- Peregrinatio Israelitarum in deserto.
Appears in Thomas Roycroft's Biblia sacra polyglotta ... edidit Brianus Waltonus, London, 1657.
